note.text: Hello and welcome to VCAT! This course will help prepare you for your deployment.

You can access all of the course materials by selecting any mission in the following placement questionnaire. Once you have entered the course, all course content will be accessible regardless of your chosen course of instruction (COI).

Before you start:
- Please disable your browser’s pop-up blocker.
- If you can’t view the entire VCAT screen without scrolling, maximize your browser window.
- If using Internet Explorer, press F11 to switch to full screen display.
